metadata.Title: CVE-2015-2304 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Absolute path traversal vulnerability in bsdcpio in libarchive 3.1.2 and earlier allows remote attackers to write to arbitrary files via a full pathname in an archive.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-2304` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

bsdcpio - 3.1.2-7ubuntu2.1
bsdtar - 3.1.2-7ubuntu2.1
libarchive13 - 3.1.2-7ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libarchive package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.2-7ubuntu2.1').
